original_title: The Phantom of the Opera: The Final Curtain
overview: After nearly 14,000 performances, the final chandelier in Broadwayâ€™s The Phantom of the Opera fell Sunday, April 16, 2023. NY1 celebrates the history-making musical phenomenon by taking viewers behind the mask that has captivated audiences for more than 35 years. Join NY1 for a look behind the curtain and a sit-down interview with Andrew Lloyd Webber, the composer of the iconic production.
title: The Phantom of the Opera: The Final Curtain
